settings.body:
Our Mixed Club ships four times per year (March, June, September and December), with six or twelve bottles per shipment (depending on your selection). Each shipment will come with a mix of reds and whites, along with the occasional sparkling or rosé. All shipments also include at least 3-4 Reserve or Collector Series selections.

You will only be charged ($95/$180) once your first shipment has been processed, and then again with each subsequent shipment. You can change your membership tier or cancel anytime. We can't wait to send your first group of wines!

settings.header: It doesn’t have to be all about you. Gift the wine club.
